author: Anne Marie
text: you know even though i been at peace past couple days, im still getting nightmares and it bugs me cos i dont remember what its about but know who is in the dreams. i wake up quick which means a bad headache when i get that sort of thing

author: Anne Marie
text: first time in 2 days iv not had a bad thought, which is a good sign, also nightmares not many of them odd one or 2 but yeah slow going but on the right path now, also my projects are helping loads and im playing pc games again watching comedy shows again, so few positive. https://t.co/rEWpw9BrWV

text: hate it when so called psychics bribing me money for a reading! 10th one so far i blocked

author: Anne Marie
text: Projects thats on the go. Long loom a scarf testing the ferisle pattern in dk yarn not the chunky. I'm also testing my home made 40 peg loom for leg warmers maroon colour, next to that is the 68 peg loom doing a brioche hat on it and the flower blanket in between row 3 of 8. https://t.co/taYpRUYqek

author: Anne Marie
text: my dreams was weird i was being tested with the maths of 3x3 and 3x4 and i did get it right but they were testing me trying to trip me up i was at my old school, and my old house (my dads) i was trying to put new window up in a storm. yep having them again,

author: Anne Marie
text: i think the word betrayed is a good word how i feel right now. dispite feeling rough still went out though today.

author: Anne Marie
text: past 2 days been feeling yuck trying to eat but making me feel even more yuck glad i have my appointment tomorrow. More importantly im drinking loads.

text: where do i go from here???? 10 fricking years i carried the guilt it was my fault my mum passed.

author: Anne Marie
text: been feeling like yuck today still do and its not cos i eaten too many easter eggs. all iv had is a bit of cake with custard thats it. im on my 3rd week of the new meds so it might be that.

author: Anne Marie
text: lol my dad would of been watching a cowboy film round about now before i call and when i asked him what he had for tea "sandwich" saturday sandwich we used to say lol God i miss him and mum!

author: Anne Marie
text: i wish the bad thoughts stop! i hope to god the rest of the year will be better. And i hope these new meds work

author: Anne Marie
text: sometimes i wish i didnt have a heart cos then it wont keep breaking, this is been my fear of loosing people who i love and care about i wish i didnt feel anything to be honest.

author: Anne Marie
text: had a ikkle kiss from my little macey such a cutie dog when i see her it makes me smile, she knows me more and more hence the hello kisses. shes had an op on her leg so shes trying to put her foot down which i have noticed vast improovement bless her but she is such a lovely dog.

author: Anne Marie
text: this year seriously need to do one, iv totally had enough now, i just hope theres no more bad news honestly its too much for 1 person to have 4 wonderful really good people in my life to pass away. I cant take the heartache anymore.

author: Anne Marie
text: i was waiting for the bus to go in town and this guy was walking to the bus top and waiting for one too he started talking to me it turns out he likes all the hobbies i do. what are the chances in that, he told me his name but iv forgotten it when i got home, good on him though.

author: Anne Marie
text: honestly, i was talking to my uncle and i said I get what depression feels like and cos i have it myself which i am fighting it iv had good days, not so good days but honestly Fight depression cos i tell ya this mental health issue and it need adressing, cos its not nice at all

author: Anne Marie
text: i have a lot on my mind today and its not shifting i dont know why or what to get from it.

author: Anne Marie
text: happy birthday to me wow 37 feel like 73 lol and i wish it was sunny instead we got rain! lol

author: Anne Marie
text: wish i could go and see my fav boys a1 @a1christian @mazzratazz @benadamsuk @MarkReadMusic that would be a dream come true, but unfortunately its not meant to be so listening to them either live or songs on youtube gives me comfort when im really low, love you guys tons xx

author: Anne Marie
text: im not coping well at the moment, but im keeping busy.

author: Anne Marie
text: i dunno my heart is in a million pieces 3 of the most important people in my life within 6 months, my dad, my brother inlaw 4 weeks ago, and my dear dear neighbor who i known my whole life last week i cant do this anymore.

author: Anne Marie
text: my other half was surprised i knew something was wrong when he said i had a letter. i said it better not be joe and i read the letter when i got back from town i knew it was him somehow i knew he passed but i dont understand

author: Anne Marie
text: i dont want anymore heartache first my dad 6 month ago, then my brother inlaw 4 weeks ago, and now my dear dear friend and neighbor who i known my whole life had passed away last tuesday. when will this heartache end!
